alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:05PM EST until January 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 10 to 20 inches. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult, with locally near whiteout conditions possible at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
